name: Little Furious
description:
The Game

Your hamster is terribly furious.

Nothing can stop him... except the hazardous obstacles on its way! You and your friends have to find out how to get rid of them by alchemic combinations. Break the ice, shake the fire, tilt the water... Will you be fast enough to beat your high score?

Friends, kids, grand-parents: everyone can enjoy and share the game's frenzy. So build your team and try the free, award-winning Little Furious!

Thanks

We'd like to sincerely thank:

  • Our school, ENJMIN, and its teachers
  • Dean Fox & Florence Duchassin who made this possible
  • Alexis Payen de la Garanderie for helping us hunting wild bugs
  • Stephan Brival for his user-friendly tips
  • Matthieu Corno & Doris Gomes for their editing and hand modeling skills
  • Morgane Berthou & Clément Duquesne for their furious voice acting
  • The zillions of testers and our families who had to bear with early versions of the game for months on end
  • And, of course, the SIFTEO staff for their great support all along the development
The Team
  • Sound design: Matthieu Bonneau (@MushroomSound)
  • Game design: Emmanuel Corno (@Yakkafo) & Léa Saugé (@Cocavert)
  • Code: Marc Gilleron (@ZylannMP3) & Romain Vivier
  • UX design: Raphaël Robert-Bouchard
  • Art: Philippe Salib
